description: The Fundación Club Campestre de Cali, established in 2002, aims to support the welfare and development of young people from the local community, particularly those serving as tennis players. Initially focused on providing basic needs, the foundation has evolved to offer educational support, vocational training, and life skills development. It emphasizes creating opportunities for higher education and employment, fostering community engagement, and promoting environmental sustainability, ultimately striving to transform lives and strengthen the social fabric of the community.
name: Fundación Club Campestre
